page.title: 15HOME LIFE cont.
page.content: Houses were usually thatched and consisted of two rooms and a kitchen. The floor was either clay or flagstone.A piece of timber was used to sit on.People slept on a mattress made of hay.If the person had any animals,he would keep them in the house with him.Their main source of warmth was the hearth_fire.Water could be obtained from a near by well. Today we can get different types of houses.In this area one finds bungalows or terraced houses.We obtain water from taps.Whereas 60 years ago the main source of supply was from spring wells.
